name: Flaming Frostbite
description:
It is recommended to read this description before playing!

You play as Bear Chylls, an explorer who has found himself deep in the forest at an unfortunate time. Winter has come early this year and it's up to you to get back to your cave to hibernate before time is up and you freeze. Pick up sticks to kindle your fire and increase the time you have to get to your cave on subsequent playthroughs. Each stick equals four more seconds on the timer when you click the retry button after losing.

CONTROLS -
Left and Right Arrow Keys: Move left and right
Z: Jump
Z + Z: Double Jump
X + Arrow Key (while airborne): Dash in direction of arrow key
Down Arrow Key: Crouch
Down Arrow Key (while airborne): Fast fall (cancels upwards velocity)

This is a game made for a 3 week class Game Jam.

Programming:
Joshua Armbrecht, Ian Springborn

Art:
Alex Stieby, Madeline Huc
